We are R2-Cerified and have a Zero Landfill Policy!

- Call today to schedule a pickup! [888-970-S3RS](tel:8889707377)


[Client Portal](https://s3erpportal.makor-erp.com/portal)

[![S3 Recycling Solutions Logo](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/S3-logo-white-for-web-375-x-144.png)](https://s3rs.com/)

![](https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/90879858efddee1e14d04b570fede401b74af1fd65444414c394b3fbfc0186df?s=82&d=mm&r=g)

### About s3rs2021

This author has not yet filled in any details.

So far s3rs2021 has created 29 blog entries.

- [![](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Web-site-Crumlin-and-Maya-320x202.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2022/01/new-board-appointments/)


## [S3 Announces Additions to Board of Advisors](https://s3rs.com/2022/01/new-board-appointments/)

S3 announced today that Attorney James Crumlin, Jr. and Myra Herring have started three-year appointments on its Board of Advisors.

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2022-05-02T19:18:36+00:00January 19th, 2022\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2022/01/new-board-appointments/)

- [![](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/second-shift-blog-320x202.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2021/11/second-shift/)


## [Second Shift Will Double S3 Processing Output](https://s3rs.com/2021/11/second-shift/)

S3 Recycling Solutions, an Inc. 5000 fastest-growing private company, is launching a second shift at its 75,000 square foot electronics recycling facility in Springfield, Tenn. The additional operating hours are expected to add 15 jobs over the next 12 months.

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2022-01-26T03:40:45+00:00November 5th, 2021\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2021/11/second-shift/)

- [![](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Data-320x202.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2021/08/s3-releases-annual-report/)


## [S3 Releases Its Inaugural Annual Report](https://s3rs.com/2021/08/s3-releases-annual-report/)

S3 Recycling Solutions shares its highlights and metrics in its latest annual report. In its inaugural publication, the annual report details the company performance and activities during an extraordinarily challenging business and economic environment.

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2022-01-26T03:41:35+00:00August 31st, 2021\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2021/08/s3-releases-annual-report/)

- [![](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Inc-5000-320x202.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2021/08/s3-inc-5000/)


## [S3 Named An Inc. 5000 Fastest-Growing Company](https://s3rs.com/2021/08/s3-inc-5000/)

Inc. magazine today revealed that S3 Recycling Solutions is on its annual Inc. 5000 list, a prestigious ranking of the nation’s fastest-growing private companies. S3 makes the list for the first time after achieving a three-year revenue growth of 248 percent.

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2022-01-26T03:42:21+00:00August 17th, 2021\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2021/08/s3-inc-5000/)

- [![](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/S3-blog-2020-ITSMF-Fellow-918-%C3%97-523-px-320x202.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2021/04/the-cost-of-insurance/)


## [S3 Chairman Named 2021 ITSMF Fellow](https://s3rs.com/2021/04/the-cost-of-insurance/)

Information Technology Senior Management Forum has named S3 Chairman Darrell S. Freeman Sr. its 2021 Fellow. The official award will be presented at ITSMF’s annual Technology Achievement Awards.

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2022-01-26T03:43:05+00:00April 16th, 2021\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2021/04/the-cost-of-insurance/)

- [![](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Rayna-320x202.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2020/12/s3-philanthropy/)


## [S3 Continues its Tradition of Holiday Philanthropy](https://s3rs.com/2020/12/s3-philanthropy/)

The S3 team continued its tradition of philanthropy and holiday giving this week. During a year that presented so many challenges, it was our honor to give back to the local Springfield community.

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2022-01-26T03:43:44+00:00December 18th, 2020\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2020/12/s3-philanthropy/)

- [![](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ITSMF-and-S3-partnership-320x202.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2020/08/itsmf-partnership/)


## [S3 Partners With Information Technology Senior Management Forum](https://s3rs.com/2020/08/itsmf-partnership/)

S3 Recycling Solutions and Information Technology Senior Management Forum (ITSMF) today announced that S3 has become ITSMF’s exclusive IT recycling partner.

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2022-01-26T03:44:23+00:00August 23rd, 2020\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2020/08/itsmf-partnership/)

- [![S3 CEO](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/RMcDaniel-1-320x202.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2018/02/nbj-honors-s3-ceo/)


## [Business Journal Honors S3 CEO](https://s3rs.com/2018/02/nbj-honors-s3-ceo/)

The Nashville Business Journal selected S3 Recycling

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2022-04-04T11:39:24+00:00February 15th, 2018\|

[Read More](https://s3rs.com/2018/02/nbj-honors-s3-ceo/)
